Package matrix_solver

Matrix solver module for the system of linear equations. The solvers include:
  • Tri-diagonal solver using todo:? algorithm
  • Penta-diagonal solver using todo:? algorithm
  • Sparse matrix solver.
More...


Functions/Subroutines

subroutine tridi_solver (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, right_hand_side, conc, ncell)
 Solves a tridiagonal system. This sub-routine was taken from the Numerical Recipes in Fortran, page 43 (Edition of 1992).

Detailed Description

Matrix solver module for the system of linear equations. The solvers include:
  • Tri-diagonal solver using todo:? algorithm
  • Penta-diagonal solver using todo:? algorithm
  • Sparse matrix solver.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine matrix_solver.tridi_solver ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  center_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  up_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  down_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(out)  conc,
integer,intent(in)  ncell 
)

Solves a tridiagonal system. This sub-routine was taken from the Numerical Recipes in Fortran, page 43 (Edition of 1992).

[B1,C1,00,00,00] [X1,X2,...] [A2,B2,C2,00,00] = [D1,D2,....] [00,A3,B3,C3,00] [00,00,A4,B4,C4] [00,00,00,A5,B5]

Variables:

A(i): Values of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix B(i): Values of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix C(i): Values of the coefficients above diagonal in matrix D(i): Values of the right hand side vector X(i): Values of the computed solution

Parameters:
center_diag Values of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
up_diag Values of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
down_diag Values of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
right_hand_side Values of the right hand side vector
conc Values of the computed solution
ncell Number of volumes
